membership:
FEFAC is member of: 
- IFIF (International Feed Industry Association) 
- EFSA Stakeholder  
- RTRS (Round Table on Responsible Soy) 
- EISA (European Initiative for Sustainable Development in Agriculture) 
- Food Chain SCP Roundtable 
- FSP (Food Safety Platform) 
- EATIP (European Aquaculture Technology & Innovation Platform) 
- EPRUMA (European Platform for the Responsible Use of Medicines in Animals)   
- FFC (EU feed & food chain platform on biotechnology) 
- EU Feed Chain Task Force on the Catalogue of Feed Materials 
- Agri Food Chain Coalition on Innovation 
- Agri Food Chain Roundtable on Pesticides 
FEFAC is an observer member of the CODEX Alimentarius
